Articles.Content:
anyone think they could somehow mod the awesome ship from Alien into the game?

http://www.flickr.com/photos/toromodel/2181215124/

You just ruined that ship for me.

It only looked good when it was ill-defined, obviously with the large central body, the two huge nascelles and the large bulging back with its own set of engines, but lit up as that model was, it was just disappointing. I imagined a much better looking ship than I\'m seeing.

Sad now.

perhaps these can make you happier?

http://www.gavinrothery.com/my-blog/2011/9/28/getting-there-the-nostromo.html

it was an awesome model

Do not miss the shots on the bottom of the page
